I've built and manage an organization spanning 3 teams under the Client Infrastructure umbrella at Airbnb. The teams are responsible for web frameworks and architecture; build, test, and performance infrastructure for the web; and GraphQL API infrastructure.

I previously managed the Accessibility team, which helps iOS, Android, and web engineers build accessible UI.

Previously

Lead development of the public API. Helped scale the website and private API from dozens of users per day to tens of thousands of users per day, with peak traffic of 4000 requests per minute on our iOS launch day.

Senior Software Engineer, 2009 – 2012

Architected and lead the front-end development of a complete redesign while working on the front-end team at Zappos HQ. After transitioning to the Zappos Labs team, lead several experiments and projects.
